item.description:
A couple was group were nice enough to help provide a location in Boston to have a 4th of July party. This is a private location, so the address will be sent out just prior to the event. Since this is a private location, the address will only be sent out to members who have attended at least one event.

We're going to make this a potluck/BBQ. There is a deck with a grill and really nice view of Boston. Bring food and drinks to share. Alcoholic drinks are allowed and recommended. When you make your RSVP, please make a comment saying what you will be bringing.

The deck doesn't have views of the fireworks, but after the pot luck, we can move somewhere to watch the fireworks.

For those of you who have allergies: There are cats that live at this location.

Looking forward to seeing you all there!
item.how_to_find_us: More details will be sent out closer to the day of the event

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Fourth of July Potluck and Party
